symptom c: low coolant level warning light is on
no low coolant level warning light is on
problem: The cooling system is clogged - it needs to be cleaned

symptom c: The air conditioner is on most of the time
Air conditioner is off most of the time
problem: The alternator belt may be slipping or the fan clutch may be damaged

symptom c: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving
problem: Check if the air filter is clean. If so then check the fuel injection sensor

symptom c: The smoke comes out of the exhaust when starting and then stops
problem: The engine sensor may be faulty

symptom c: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving even after the engine has warmed up
problem: A new head gasket may be needed

symptom c: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving and stops after the engine has warmed up
The smoke comes out during startup and then stops
problem: The engine sensor may be damaged
Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs
Check for a vacuum leak or moisture in the distributor cap (distributor)

symptom c: It happens while driving at a certain speed
problem: Check the balance of the four wheels

symptom c: The braking also has vibrations from the front
problem: Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs

symptom c: It only happens under heavy braking and there is no vibration from the front end
problem: This is a normal situation. The anti lock system pulsates the brakes
Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs
